1. 10 (and counting…) Google goodies for your classroom  eSchool News
  2. Gemini in Classroom: No-cost AI tools that amplify teaching and learning  Google Blog
  3. Google embraces AI in the classroom with new Gemini tools for educators, chatbots for students, and more  TechCrunch
  4. Google is opening its NotebookLM AI tools to students under 18  The Verge
  5. ISTE 2025: Celebrating the art of teaching and the science of learning  Google Blog
